canJumpOver(Piece) - Method in class logic.tile.Tile
Determines if a given piece can jump over the tile.
canMove(int, int, int, int) - Method in class logic.Game
Given a starting row and column and an ending row and column (called newRow and newColumn), this method determines if the move is possible.
